mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOES (SHOESNO, MEMBERNO, TITLE, BRAND, PRICE, DISCOUNT, CONTENTS) VALUES (SHOES_SEQ.nextval, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{brand}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{contents})
INSERT INTO OPTIONS (OPTIONNO, SIZES, COLOR, SHOESNO) VALUES (OPTION_SEQ.nextval, #{sizes}, #{color}, #{shoesno})
mapper.select: SELECT SHOESNO, MEMBERNO, TITLE, BRAND, RATING, PRICE, DISCOUNT, CONTENTS, VISIBLE FROM shoes ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT r.reviewno, r.contents, r.grade, r.shoesno, r.memberno, r.rdate FROM review r JOIN shoes s ON s.shoesno = r.shoesno WHERE r.shoesno = #{shoesno}

SELECT s.title, s.brand, s.contents FROM shoes s JOIN category_list cl ON s.shoesno = cl.shoesno JOIN category c ON cl.categoryno = c.categoryno WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || ('스니커즈') || '%' OR (BRAND) LIKE '%' || ('스니커즈') || '%'

SELECT s.title, s.brand, s.contents FROM shoes s JOIN category_list cl ON s.shoesno = cl.shoesno JOIN category c ON cl.categoryno = c.categoryno WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || ('슬립온') || '%' OR (BRAND) LIKE '%' || ('슬립온') || '%'
SELECT s.*, o.OPTIONNO, o.SIZE, o.AMOUNT, o.COLOR FROM SHOES s INNER JOIN OPTION o ON s.SHOESNO = o.SHOESNO WHERE s.SHOESNO = #{shoesno}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM SHOES WHERE SHOESNO = #{shoesno}

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM shoes
WHERE UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(BRAND) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY shoesno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM options WHERE shoesno = #{shoesno} ORDER BY optionno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM review
WHERE UPPER(contents) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY grade ASC
